titles.title: A resolution to authorize legal representation in United States of America v. Elena Ruth Sassower.
A resolution to authorize legal representation in United States of America v. Elena Ruth Sassower.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent certain named Senators, their employees, and any other Member, officer, or employee subpoenaed in the case of United States of America v. Elena Ruth Sassower, with respect to their testimony or documents relating to their official responsibilities.
